channel.title: Inclusion and Equity on Strong Opinions, Weekly Held
channel.description: Recent content in Inclusion and Equity on Strong Opinions, Weekly Held

item.title: Inclusion/Equity and Evaluating Negatives
item.description: Evaluating properties like inclusion and equity of products can’t be done through exhaustive enumeration of product outcomes. Instead we will need to increasingly rely on the controls that we place how we construct the products.

item.title: On Gender Gap in Adolescent Mental Health
item.description: A recent study found that more gender-equal countries have larger gender gaps in mental health. I look at the data that seems to have yielded this counter-intuitive results and find it lacking.
